effects.effect: Disables the target's last used move, preventing its use for 4â€“7 turns, selected at random, or until the target leaves the field.  If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed,  if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, or if it already has a move disabled, this move will fail.
effects.shortEffect: Disables the target's last used move for 1-8 turns.

moveDescription:
For four turns, this move prevents the target from
using the move it last used.
